name: finjen
description:
What does the future hold for us?

Sometimes we're too preoccupied with how busy life can get that we forget to stop for a rest and enjoy life. Sip on a cup of coffee while Khayria, the Qahwe shop keeper reads your fortune for you.

finjen (small cup in Lebanese Arabic) is a short narrative game inspired by my love for coffee and my busy lifestyle, designed and developed for the SnomJam. The theme of the jam was "live fast, die strong" but I say "live fast, don't forget to slow down."

If you like what you see, consider buying me a coffee or reaching out on twitter.
